thread.title: Travel Counsellors to swap Bolton for Manchester
thread.title_full: Travel Counsellors to swap Bolton for Manchester

title: Travel Counsellors to swap Bolton for Manchester
text:
Travel Counsellors to swap Bolton for Manchester 19 August 2015 
Travel Counsellors is to move its headquarters from Bolton to a new development on the edge of Manchester city centre. 
The new office will house the firm’s 200 support staff. 
Managing director Steve Byrne said “We have enjoyed our 15 years at Travel House in Bolton, but have now outgrown the building so took this as an opportunity to find a location and building to meet the current and long term needs of the business.” 
Travel Counsellors are expected to relocate staff before the end of the year.
